name: Test Project (devASingh)
description:
Just another Bunny Platformer!

The Bunny Empire has fallen and the evil have sent them all the bunnies into the deepest and darkest caves of Earth.

You find a way as told by the old bunnies to revive the fallen kingdom - To get The Bunny Treasure. And you have find the way to be luckily in the same cave but it's not that easy. Make your way into the darkest of the caves to find The Bunny Treasure.

Be sure not to forget to collect all those coins and carrots in your way to The Bunny Treasure.

Features
  • Easily customizable controls.
  • Lots of Awards to win.
  • An Infinite platformer.
  • Tons of carrots and coins to collect
  • Eerie background music to divert your mind!

... and yeah beware to do all that in your lives!

Big Challenging Bit. Isn't it?

System Requirements
  • CPU : 1.6 GHz (tested) though will work on lower too.
  • RAM : 1GB minimum.
  • Hard Drive : 50MB max space required.
  • Screen Resolution : 1366x768 (others too are supported).
Credits
  • Godot Engine used
Extra: My First ever Game and took me a lot time to build. Hence please consider supporting me by donating or buying.

Venture into the Dark Caves as "The Bunny" now...
